content: NEW YORK Retail foreign exchange broker FXCM Inc   reeling after customers lost more than $200 million from the surging Swiss franc  will get a $300 million loan from Leucadia National Corp to keep operating  the companies said in a statement Friday.

title: FX broker FXCM gets rescue from Jefferies parent Leucadia
